properties.entry: SELECT BID_NO , BID_PRICE , BID_STATUS , SALE_NAME , SALE_CONDITION , SALE_SIZE , SALE_CATEGORY , PR_IMAGE FROM BID B JOIN SALE USING(SALE_NO) JOIN P_REG USING(PR_NO) WHERE B.MEM_USER_NO = ? ORDER BY BID_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM BID JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_USER_NO) WHERE MEM_USER_NO = ? AND BID_STATUS = '경매중'
